title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 80.4 - Habit-forming drugs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 80.4 - Habit-forming drugs

State Regulations

The following chemical derivatives of barbituric acid, a substance named in section 502(d) of the Federal Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act, are hereby designated as habit-forming: PARENT SUBSTANCE-BARBITURIC ACID
Chemical description of derivative

Common or official name of chemical derivative or its salts

Some trade or other names of chemical derivative or its salts

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
